env.info: (hold 0) (plate 15) (at 0 4) (sort 1 couch) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 bed) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 table) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (sort 4 desk) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (sort 5 washmachine) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (type 5 container) (closed 5) (sort 6 refrigerator) (size 6 big) (at 6 6) (type 6 container) (closed 6) (sort 8 book) (size 8 small) (color 8 red) (sort 9 book) (size 9 small) (color 9 blue) (inside 9 6) (sort 10 book) (size 10 small) (color 10 green) (sort 11 cup) (size 11 small) (color 11 red) (sort 12 cup) (size 12 small) (color 12 blue) (sort 13 cup) (size 13 small) (color 13 green) (at 13 3) (sort 14 can) (size 14 small) (color 14 white) (sort 15 can) (size 15 small) (color 15 black)

test.instr: (:ins (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X bed)))) (:cons_not (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue) (sort Y refrigerator) (type Y container)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X white) (sort Y washmachine) (type Y container)))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X cup))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (sort Y couch))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (sort Y refrigerator) (type Y container))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X blue) (sort Y desk))) )
test.nl: Do not go to bed. Do not take out the blue book from refrigerator. The white can must be in washmachine. Pick up a cup. Please put a cup on couch. Please put a book in refrigerator. Please put the blue cup on the desk.
